summary: An abstract method with the purpose of loading the asset.

parameters.name: info
parameters.description: A class specific object containing the information needed to load the asset.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: **Optional:** the function to be called when the asset has finished loading.

remarks: No implementation is present for this method and must be implemented in classes which derive from Asset.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
